author: IGN
description:
IGN's Superman review critic, Tom Jorgenson, talks about the new Superman movie directed by James Gunn with IGN's Man of Steel review critic, Jim Vejvoda. In this SPOILER FREE discussion, our critics weigh in on the Snyder vs. Gunn debate and discuss each directors' approach to Superman and thier wider DC cinematic universes. 

For more on Superman, James Gunn, DC Studios, David Cornswet, and everything else comics, stay tuned to IGN!
title: IGN's Superman & Man of Steel Critics on the Different DC Universe Launches

author: IGN
description: Check out the Sandy Cheeks Showcase Trailer for Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, an upcoming action-adventure RPG developed by Petit Fabrok and Fair Play Labs. Don't miss Sandy Cheeks in action with her aggressive Hammer Swing and ability to lasso enemies in her way. Play as Sandy Cheeks in Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, launching in Fall 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny - Official Sandy Cheeks Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at the quaint world of Mini Painter in this trailer for the upcoming cozy isometric desktop game about a tiny artisan who paints miniatures. Don’t press him too hard… but don’t let him slack off, either. Mini Painter will be available on PC on July 24, 2025.
title: Mini Painter - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a behind-the-scenes look at The Fantastic Four: First Steps and meet the cast of the upcoming MCU film. The Fantastic Four: First Steps stars Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ralph Ineson, and Julia Garner. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, they must defend Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus (Ralph Ineson) and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer (Julia Garner). And if Galactus’ plan to devour the entire planet and everyone on it weren’t bad enough, i
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official 'Meet The Family' Behind the Scenes Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description: The moment is now. Check out the NBA 2K26 announcement trailer for this upcoming sports game. NBA 2K26 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch 2 on September 5, 2025.
title: NBA 2K26 - Official Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the 15th Anniversary Trailer for PlayStation Plus, the hit gaming subscription service for PlayStation hardware. PlayStation Plus has been offering value since its inception in 2010, bringing cloud saves, Online Play starting with PlayStation 4 in 2013, and the current three-tiered structure today with Essential, Extra, and Premium. Take a look at the latest trailer to see all of the value PlayStation Plus has provided throughout its 15-year run and counting. PlayStation Plus is available now for PlayStation consoles.
title: PlayStation Plus - Official 15th Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description:
IGN can exclusively reveal an action scene from director James Gunn’s Superman. The clip is introduced by Superman star David Corenswet.

In the scene, the villainous Lex Luthor (Nicholas Hoult) directs his staff in programming The Hammer of Boravia's fight moves against the Man of Steel as they brawl over the skies of Metropolis.

Superman opens nationwide release in theaters and IMAX on July 11.

#Superman #IGN #DC
title: Superman - Exclusive Clip (2025) David Corenswet, Nicholas Hoult

description:

title: Superman fights the Hammer of Boravia in this exclusive clip from Superman! #superman #movie #ign

author: IGN
description:
Tune in on Thursday, July 10 at 2pm PT / 5pm ET / 11pm CEST for a special Sony State of Play focusing on Ghost of Yotei. The livestream will be 20 minutes long, hosted by Sucker Punch’s Creative Directors, Jason Connell and Nate Fox. Viewers will learn about new weapons and gameplay modes, ways to customize your journey, and more!
Stay tuned after the stream for a special live episode of IGN's Podcast Beyond, reacting to everything revealed about Sucker Punch's upcoming open-world game!

#IGN
title: Sony State of Play: Ghost of Yotei Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Trailer for Restaurats, a medieval cooking simulation game developed by toR Studio. Players will coordinate with a team of rats to cook food, serve tables, and improve the quality of the restaurant to become the best place to dine. Receive special cards affecting dishes, abilities, money, and more to improve your tavern. Restaurats is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now on Steam.

#Restaurats #Gaming #IGN
title: Restaurats - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Tune in to IGN at 10am PT / 1pm ET for a special convo about James Gunn's Superman, and an exclusive clip revealed! 

#IGN #Superman
title: Superman Exclusive Clip Reveal Livestream

author: IGN
description:
Are Death Stranding and Metal Gear Solid too reliant on cinematics? We worked out just how much of Hideo Kojima's games are cutscenes! From the likes of Snake Eater, The Phantom Pain, Guns of the Patriots, Sons of Liberty, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, and more.

Could you just watch a Metal Gear Solid movie, or a collection of every Death Stranding cutscenes, and still enjoy Kojima's single-player stories? From his time at Konami to Kojima Productions, we try and answer whether or not there are too many cutscenes in a Kojima game.

On the topic of fantastic games, there's never been a better time to score some incredible titles through Humble. Live now through August 5th, grab Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, DAEMON X MACHINA, Death’s Door, Cat Quest 3, and more, through a Humble Choice membership. Want to find out more? Check the link down below!

https://www.humblebundle.com/membership

#IGN #DeathStranding #MetalGearSolid #Kojima
title: How Much Of Kojima's Games Are Actually Cutscenes? We Did the Maths

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Season Break Cinematic Trailer for Delta Force, a free-to-play first-person tactical action online shooter developed by Team Jade. Chaos is said to be fate improvising, and the operators in Delta Force know all too well about chaos. Take a look at the cinematic trailer displaying a tale of two sides, an inevitable reunion, one might say, as a new Season looms ever so closely. Season Break for Delta Force is available now for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam) with Season Break launching with the console versions for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S on August 19.

#DeltaForce #Gaming #IGN
title: Delta Force - Official Season Break Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description: Hear from ESO players about their first experience of the game #sponsored #TheElderScrollsOnline #IGN
title: How Oblivion Inspired a Generation of The Elder Scrolls Online Players

author: IGN
description:
Following the success of Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered, continue your adventure in Tamriel with The Elder Scrolls Online! The Elder Scrolls Online player and streamer Dawnwhisper speaks with fellow ESO players about their experiences with Oblivion and how it led them to discovering and playing The Elder Scrolls Online.

Sponsored by Bethesda.

Special thanks to Dawnwhisper https://www.twitch.tv/dawnwhisper
title: How Oblivion Inspired a Generation of The Elder Scrolls Online Players

author: IGN
description:
Check out the teaser trailer for The SpongeBob Movie: Search For SquarePants, an upcoming film starring Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown, Rodger Bumpass, Bill Fagerbakke, Carolyn Lawrence, Mr. Lawrence, George Lopez, Isis “Ice Spice” Gaston, Arturo Castro, Sherry Cola with Regina Hall and Mark Hamill. 

SpongeBob and his Bikini Bottom friends set sail in their biggest, all-new, can’t miss cinematic event ever…The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants. Desperate to be a big guy, SpongeBob sets out to prove his bravery to Mr. Krabs by following The Flying Dutchman – a mysterious swashbuckling ghost pirate – on a seafaring comedy-adventure that takes him to the deepest depths of the deep sea, where no Sponge has gone before.

The SpongeBob Movie: Search For SquarePants is produced by Lisa Stewart, p.g.a., Pam Brady, and Aaron Dem. Marc Ceccarelli, Vincent Waller, Pete Chiappetta, Anthony Tittanegro, and Andrew Lary serve as executive producers. It is based on the series “SpongeBob SquarePants”
title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search For SquarePants - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown

author: IGN
description: Developer GSC Game World has announced that  S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl will be released on PlayStation 5 and PS5 Pro in late 2025. The team says the PS5 version "will fully utilize DualSense controller features, including haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for deeper player immersion. Further technical enhancements for the PS5 Pro are also in development." STALKER 2 released to critical acclaim on PC and Xbox Series X|S last November, with IGN awarding the survival first-person shooter an 8 out of 10.
title: STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl – Official PS5 Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
On today's Daily Fix, Naughty Dog surprise drops a new update for The Last of Us 2 that changes gives you a new way to experience the game, also Sony announces a deep dive for Ghost of Yotei at this week’s State of Play this week and lastly, Pokemon fan flies all the way to Italy to show him a very special Pokemon card.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Last of Us Part 2 Gets New Story Mode & Uncharted Costumes - IGN Daily Fix
